attributes.action: BAN SERVICE CHARGES from all UK restaurants/bars as they are not given at all or fairly to waiters/staff by employers or make sure service charges are fully consumed by empoyees not the owners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By signing this petition you will be helping a mass of restaurant/bar workers to make most of their sevice.  In the UK many restaurants have service charges which are not given to the staff.  Owners operate those charges not to help their staff but to generate extra profits (more likely to be tax-free or tax-hidden as they pretend that they are given to the staff).
